channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
on my server, i would like there to be a command called ::ancients which converts your magic instead of going to the alter incase your doing something and you need to convert but you dont want to leave. please send me the command!!
deob:317
thanks!

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

i get this error when i put that, maybe i put it in the wrong section help me

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ancient")) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

public int ancients = 0; if(command.startsWith("ancients")) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

put that in custom commands, and if you want ancients off, here you go:

if(command.startsWith("ancientsoff")) { RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!");

I think your missing a variable, so I made one called ancients
put the first command inside custom commands FIRST!
So what this command does is make a variable called ancients with the value 0
when you do the command ancients, it turns into value 1 and gives you the ancients book
when you do ancientsoff, it turns back to value 0 and gives you normal book.
If the first command fails, try working out the brackets, cuz I get flamed constantly for missing brackets.
Oh and also, in the first command, use the tab key instead of space 8 times.

Read full topic
